name: Juice Box
description:
How to play?

There will be 4 beats as a customer walks past the Juice stand. You must create the 5th beat by clicking in time with the previous beats. There will be other customers walking past to act as distractions which emphasises the need of the audio and not relying on visuals. Warning. You may get some visual glitches on the web GL version. Please use the pc download for the true experience. This is a hard game.

This game is a submission for the Juice Jam. Yes we didn't make it as juicy as we wanted, but its a game around JUICE.

A rhythm game based around a octopus serving customers JUICE.

You must listen to the 4 beats, and click on the 5th in time to keep your money income up. (shown on the bar).

The downloadable build is more finished and optimised. The web GL build is a rough version of the game with a few bugs.

This game was made by me and FatSquid!
